concept.title: What is Goal Seek?
concept.shortdesc: A brief description of the method Goal Seek.

conbody.p: A formula is built based on one or more variables. Normally you want to calculate the result of the formula at certain values for the variables. So, the values for the variables are known but not the result of the formula. What if you want a certain result, but don't know the values for the variables. Then you can use Excels Goal Seek. With Goal Seek the value in a specific cell will be changed until a formula that depends on that cell returns the result you want.
Goal Seek can only change the value in a single cell. You must use Excels Solver if the result of the formula depends on the values in multiple cells.
